subject: Re: [junit] Can one unit test Java Interfaces with JUnit?
msgSnippet: ...  ... Well, you can test it using JUnit. :) Check out http://c2.com/cgi/wiki?AbstractTestCases for a discussion of the abstract test case technique.
messageBody:
>Does anyone who's had some experience know whether or not JUnit can
>perform unit tests on interfaces?
<snip />
>Can JUnit test this?

Well, you can test it using JUnit. :) Check out
http://c2.com/cgi/wiki?AbstractTestCases for a discussion of the abstract
test case technique. I discovered a bug in IBM's EJB code using it. :)

J. B. Rainsberger
President, Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com
Let's build software that people understand
